Name: Ekko
AbilityDescription:
Ekko dives in, granting himself a shield for 5 seconds and taunts nearby enemies. When the shield breaks, he emits a time field, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their attack speed by 50% for 2 seconds.

Shield Amount : 500 / 650 / 2000

Damage : 120 / 180 / 1500
